post.description: This endpoint allows a user to log in using their email and password. A valid token is returned upon successful authentication.
This endpoint allows a user to register by providing their name, email, password, and other required details.
This endpoint allows an authenticated user to log out by revoking their issued tokens.

message.example: Unauthorized - Token not provided or invalid
